meanings.definition: The state of being excessively excitable or easily stimulated.
meanings.sent1: Her hyperexcitabilities made it challenging for her to focus in class.
meanings.sent2: The child's hyperexcitabilities were evident when he couldn't sit still during the movie.
meanings.sent3: His hyperexcitabilities were on full display when he won the lottery and couldn't stop jumping for joy.
meanings.sent4: The hyperexcitabilities of the crowd at the concert were like a wave of energy pulsating through the venue.
meanings.sent5: The hyperexcitabilities of the puppy were adorable but exhausting for its owner.

meanings.definition: The tendency to react strongly or excessively to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The athlete's hyperexcitabilities drove him to push himself harder during training.
meanings.sent2: Her hyperexcitabilities caused her to jump with excitement at every little good news.
meanings.sent3: The hyperexcitabilities of the cat were evident when it pounced on a moving shadow.
meanings.sent4: The hyperexcitabilities of the storm were like a fierce beast unleashed upon the town.
meanings.sent5: The hyperexcitabilities of the students were contagious, spreading enthusiasm throughout the classroom.
